text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1983-84 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 5, 1983 to June 27, 1984), see the links below ==References== ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1983-84
title: List of 1983–84 NBA season transactions
